content: please note that the paid pattern is the ad-free and printable pdf version of a free online pattern on supergurumi com **free english version** https //www supergurumi com/amigurumi-dog-crochet-pattern **free german version** https //www supergurumi de/amigurumi-hund-haekeln **free spanish version** https //www supergurumi com/es/patron-de-crochet-perro-amigurumi **free french version** https //www supergurumi com/fr/tutoriel-chien-au-crochet-patron-amigurumi **free dutch version** https //www supergurumi com/nl/amigurumi-hond-haken-knuffel-haakpatroon this little dog can be crocheted relatively quickly and is perfect as a decorative figurine gift or key chain **about the pattern ** the crochet pattern comes as a printable pdf and is available in english us terminology german spanish french and dutch the pattern is written in detail and extensively illustrated available as an instant download after purchase the finished dog has a height of 4 5 cm **materials used ** this pattern was crocheted using the „schachenmayr catania yarn 100% cotton meterage 125 m yarn ball weight 50 g yarn weight sport - 5ply / fine 2 in the following colors coffee kaffee 162 camel camel 179 sand sand 404 2 5 mm crochet hook tapestry needle polyfill scissors 6 mm safety eyes **techniques you need to know ** slip knot magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet decrease / increase crochet into the front and back loop color change close openings sewing ***have fun crocheting ***
